general_info.summary: This text appears to be a sitemap or navigation structure for a university website, specifically focusing on the School of Business Management at NIU. It lists various sections such as careers, feedback, about the university (including leadership, recognitions, awards, and collaborations), internal quality assurance (IQAC), annual reports, university authorities, and various policies related to fees, scholarships, and conduct. It also mentions specific programs like NIIMS and Global MBA, and includes a source URL.

admission_requirements.summary: This text appears to be a list of various admission-related links and information for an institution, possibly a university, that utilizes CUET for admissions. It includes options for applying to CUET counselling, details on the admission process and alerts, information for Ph.D. admissions, domestic brochures for Indian students, and general prospectus information. The "Admission and Outreach Team" is also mentioned as a point of contact or resource.
